summary: Quick kickoff/standup with introductions and role confirmations; QA requested to be notified when work is ready for testing and the PM/architect/developer reiterated readiness to coordinate.

actions.task: Notify Jordan (QA) when a change or feature is ready for testing
Confirm and assign today's work items and priorities to the team
Surface any architecture concerns or blockers relevant to today's work

risks.risk: No specific work items or priorities defined for the day
risks.mitigation: PM (Sarah) to confirm and assign priorities and scope before implementation begins

risks.risk: Testing may be delayed if QA is not notified or lacks context
risks.mitigation: Developer to notify QA (Jordan) when items are ready and provide test notes/acceptance criteria
